padachhed: आत्मना विन्दते वीर्यं विद्यया विन्दते अमृतम् ॥
anvaya: आत्मना वीर्यं विन्दते विद्यया अमृतम् विन्दते ॥

en: Perception based knowledge leads (a person) to acquisition of immortality.
From the Self strength (by understanding the Self) is acquired, with that knowledge immortality is acquired.
